name: Potion Craft(BusyLittleBean)
description:
“Potion Craft” is a first person point and click potion cooking game that takes place in a magic shop. Chop, crush and combine magical ingredients including the most magical Sweet Potate to create magical potions! Sprinkle on extra ingredients to change the colours of the ingredients! Follow the recipes to complete customer requests and mail them once complete! Just don’t burn your potions. And don’t send burnt potions, that’s just mean. Try to complete as many potions as you can to get the highest score possible!
CONTROLS:
LEFT CLICK: Pick up ingredients, place ingredients, open processing station, control tools in processing stations
RIGHT CLICK: Leave any processing station
SPACE BAR: use tools in any processing station
ESCAPE: pause game
HOW TO MAKE A POTION:
Choose a recipe to complete (these are on the left by the window)
Select an ingredient from the shelf, click to pick it up
Set it down on a station
process the ingredient
move it to the next station, process it there
Once the ingredient has been processed, pick it up and move it to a cauldron - it will start cooking straight away so quickly prepare your other ingredients and get them in before it burns!
your completed potion will appear on top of the cauldron
pick it up and click on the recipe you used!
And bam you’re a wizard! Now do all of that again a lot of times!
